SEARCH
Package nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.recorder

Class Recorder

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.recorder.Recorder
public class Recorder extends Object
Class used by the App module to generate a Recorder object. Handles recording and playback of game events.
Author:
Joshua Neylan

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    private static final record 
    Recorder.ChapEvent
    Wraps Chap's movement into an object to be read at a later point.
    private static class 
    Recorder.ChapEventDeserializer
    Deserializes JSON into ChapEvent objects.
    private static class 
    Recorder.ChapEventSerializer
    Serializes ChapEvent objects to JSON.
    private static interface 
    Recorder.Event
    Interface representing an event in the game.
    private static class 
    Recorder.EventDeserializer
    Deserializes JSON into Event objects, handling both generic Events and ChapEvents.
    private static class 
    Recorder.EventSerializer
    Serializes generic Event objects to JSON.
    private static interface 
    Recorder.FileOperation
    Wrapper allowing file operations to be given as arguments without worrying about dealing with exception first.
    static final record 
    Recorder.RecordingChanges
    Represents changes made by recorder to the game to be consumed by App

  • Constructor Details

    • Recorder

      public Recorder(int currentLevel, Consumer<Recorder.RecordingChanges> updateReciever)
      Constructor intended to be used by App for creating recorder object.
      Parameters:
      currentLevel - The current level number.
      updateReciever - Takes in recording changes so App can adapt to them.

    • Recorder

      public Recorder(Consumer<Recorder.RecordingChanges> updateReciever, Supplier<GameStateController> levelSupplier)
      Constructor allowing recorder to work When first level is not "level1". Intended for testing
      Parameters:
      levelSupplier - Gives recorder modifiable game at first level.

  • Method Details

    • handleRecording

      private void handleRecording(String operationType, Recorder.FileOperation fileOperation)
      Handles common logic for file operations such as load or save. Shows a message to the user if the operation succeeds.

    • loadRecording

      public void loadRecording()
      Used by App module. Reads JSON file, interpreting data into a list of ChapEvent objects.

    • saveRecording

      public void saveRecording()
      Used by App module. Writes JSON file, by serializing a list of ChapEvent objects.

    • ping

      public void ping(Chap.Direction direction, int currentTime)
      Used by App module to inform Recorder when chap is moving and what direction.
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction chap is moving.
      currentTime - Time when user inputed to move chap.

    • ping

      public void ping(int currentTime)
      Used by App module to inform Recorder of an unspecified event In current state the only unspecified event that you would use this without the other ping method is for actor.
      Parameters:
      currentTime - Time when user inputed to move chap.

    • setPlaybackSpeed

      public int setPlaybackSpeed(int eventsPerSecond)
      Used by App module to just set the automatic replay speed.
      Parameters:
      eventsPerSecond - Rate events play for auto replay
      Returns:
      Rate that autoReplaySpeed was set to.

    • previousStep

      public void previousStep()
      Used by App module to go back to the previous chap movement.

    • nextStep

      public void nextStep()
      Used by App module to go forward to the next chap movement.

    • step

      private void step()
      Used to step recording forward to appropriate position from beginning. updates App using its receiver after doing so.

    • checkInvalidStepState

      private boolean checkInvalidStepState()
      Provides information to tell if stepping should be occur.
      Returns:
      boolean which is true if stepping should occur.

    • findPreviousChapEvent

      private void findPreviousChapEvent()
      Finds where the last chap event is in event list from current event's index. returns to start if there isn't a chap event to go back to.

    • findNextChapEvent

      private void findNextChapEvent()
      Finds where the next chap event is in event list from current event's index. goes to end if there isn't a chap event to go forward to.

    • autoReplay

      public void autoReplay()
      Used by App module to automatically step forward or backwards through recording. Can be toggled on and off.

    • onGameLose

      public void onGameLose()
      Removes the most recent chap event added to event list. (Additionally any others in the way!)

    • getChap

      public Chap getChap()
      Intended for making testing easier.
      Returns:
      Chap's position in game model recording can view.
